short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Overlays UR and problem markers onto Livemap

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add-on for the Waze Livemap to show UR and map problem markers.  The markers shown on the map can be selected using similar filtering options as found in my UROverview WME add-on.
